name: A lot of Pizzas
description:
Michele Iorio - Kuiying Meng

Quarantine Jam: A Lot of Pizzas

This game was made for the Quarantine Jam.
Move the chef left and right with arrows or by using A and D.
Collect the ingredients as listed in the top left of the screen in order to create a pizza.
If you collect the wrong ingredient you'll lose 5 seconds.
If the time runs up before you have all the ingredients it's game over.
Enjoy :)
